org.jacktheclipper.frontend.controller

Class SysAdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacktheclipper.frontend.controller.SysAdminController

  • @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_SYSADMIN\')")
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin")
 @Controller
public class SysAdminController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all pages that are exclusive to a user with the role SystemAdministrator. This includes pages that allow to add sources to the Clipping Service. Methods in this class are only accessible by a user with role UserRole.SystemAdministrator as defined in UserRole.resolveAuthorities()

      • editClients

        @GetMapping(value="/editclients")
public java.lang.String editClients(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                       org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="clientId",required=false)
                                                                       java.util.UUID clientId)
        Shows a page where a UserRole.SystemAdministrator can edit all principal units.
        Parameters:
        model -
        auth -
        clientId - The id of the OrganizationalUnit that the user wants to edit. If the id is null this defaults to the first client available
        Returns:
        The edit page for principal units

      • addClient

        @PostMapping(value="/addclient")
public java.lang.String addClient(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth,
                                                                    @RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                    java.lang.String name,
                                                                    @RequestParam(value="mail")
                                                                    java.lang.String mail,
                                                                    org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Adds a new principal unit to the Jack the Clipper application
        Parameters:
        auth -
        name - The name of the new OrganizationalUnit. Since it is a principal unit OrganizationalUnit.parentId defaults to the one of "SYSTEM".
        mail - The mail of the automatically generated UserRole.StaffChief for the new principal unit
        redirectAttributes -
        Returns:
        The page where all principal units can be edited

      • editClient

        @PostMapping(value="/editclient")
public java.lang.String editClient(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth,
                                                                      @ModelAttribute(value="currentClient")
                                                                      OrganizationalUnit unit,
                                                                      @RequestParam(value="blacklist")
                                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> blacklist,
                                                                      @RequestParam(value="sources")
                                                                      java.lang.String sourcesAsString,
                                                                      org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Updates an already existing OrganizationalUnit by manipulating the object itself or its corresponding OrganizationalUnitSettings.
        Parameters:
        auth -
        unit - The updated version of the OrganizationalUnit
        blacklist - A list of words this OrganizationalUnit that determines whether an Article should be shown or not for this principal unit
        sourcesAsString - A a list of Source'S Source.name. So that they can be reconstructed to the actual objects in the database.
        redirectAttributes -
        Returns:
        The page where all principal units can be edited
